briefTitle: A Cost-Effective Handheld Breast Scanner for Use in Low Resource Environments: A Validation Study
officialTitle: A Cost-Effective Handheld Breast Scanner for Use in Low Resource Environments: A Validation Study
primaryOutcomeMeasure: Estimate the sensitivity of the iBE device examinations using imaging results
eligibilityCriteria:
Inclusion Criteria:

18 years or older

* women or men with symptomatic breast lump by palpation or imaging

Exclusion Criteria:

* under 18 years of age
